job.title: Affinity Group Data Analyst
job.description:
Description
At First Republic, we care about our people. We offer extraordinary client service in private banking, private business banking and private wealth management. Founded in 1985, we believe that personal connections are everything and our success is driven by the relationships we form with our colleagues and clients. You'll always feel empowered and valued at First Republic.
Incredible teams doing exceptional work, everyday
Responsibilities
The primary function of the Affinity Group Data Analyst is to provide support, data management and reporting to the various verticals and management teams of the Financial Executives Alliance (FEA).
What you'll be doing as a Affinity Group Data Analyst:
Maintain and update internal FEA CRM system - validate/update information, check existence of firm and customer
Review daily "Term Sheet' e-newsletter and add missing firms from database to CRM system
Research and validate new members - conduct due diligence on membership applications
For new members who have been validated - update online profiles and add them to their appropriate E-lists
Research "bounce back" email addresses and update profiles if uncover new contact information. Create and send list to FEA management for unresolved
Conduct various internet research projects as directed - searching for members on LinkedIn
Follow up on firms/individuals who we've lost track of
Reporting
Send weekly report of new members to FEA Management
Compile and distribute monthly banker business prospecting report
Pull quarterly new business report leveraging internal reporting system
Website & Events
Maintain website content including - approved articles, webinars, refresh job board, board member
Potentially assist FEA Marketing Associate with event confirmation emails and phone calls to membership
Maintain and update Master RSVP tracking report
Provide support on any IT issues
Qualifications
You could be a great fit if you have:
Mastery of personal computers in a Windows-based environment (including Microsoft Office Suite and Outlook), especially data management and Excel reporting.
Preferred experience with basic html coding and especially SQL but not required
Excellent attention to detail and high degree of accuracy and consistency
Excellent organizational, communication skills (whether interaction is in person, over the telephone or via email)
Excellent customer service skills
Preferred familiarity with the Alternative Investment Industry but not required
Will be required to multi-task on a daily basis due to fast paced business environment and demand
Maintain productive and upbeat attitude within high pressured environment
Ability to work independently, prioritize and self-start projects under minimal supervision
BS/BA degree or equivalent experience preferred
Job Demands
Must be able to review and analyze data reports and manuals; must be computer proficient.
Must be able to communicate effectively via telephone and in person.
Own your work and your career - apply now
Are you willing to take initiative and make decisions? Are you willing to go the extra mile because you love what you do and how you can contribute as a team? Do you want the freedom to grow and the opportunity to take charge of your own career? If so, then come join us.
We want hard working team players. You'll have the independence to learn, lead and drive change. A culture of extraordinary service, empowerment and stability - that's the First Republic way. Come join us!
This job description is not intended to be all-inclusive. Employee may perform other related duties as assigned to meet the ongoing needs of the organization. The Company is an equal opportunity employer. In this regard, the Company makes reasonable accommodations for qualified applicants and employees with disabilities in order to enable them to perform all essential job functions, unless doing so creates an undue hardship.
First Republic is subject to federal laws that restrict the employment of individuals with certain types of criminal histories, including FDIA Section 19 and FINRA. To the extent not inconsistent with our obligations under those federal laws and regulations, First Republic will consider qualified candidates with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the Los Angeles and San Francisco ban-the-box laws.
